actions.committee: House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs (Subsequently: International Relations).

official_title: Concurrent resolution to provide an opportunity for an orderly and cohesive policy toward inflation control and economic stability by declaring a 36-month moratorium on all foreign aid appropriations for economic development.

summary.text: Provides a thirty-six month moratorium on all foreign aid appropriations for economic development.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution to provide an opportunity for an orderly and cohesive policy toward inflation control and economic stability by declaring a 36-month moratorium on all foreign aid appropriations for economic development.
